com.buralotech.oss.ldapunit

Class TestDirectoryServerRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buralotech.oss.ldapunit.TestDirectoryServerRule

  • public class TestDirectoryServerRule
extends Object
    Unit test the DirectoryServerRule rule.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.buralotech.oss.ldapunit.DirectoryServerRule directoryServerRule
      The rule being tested.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assertCustomSchemaCanBeUsedOnItsOwn()
      Verify that the server can be started with a custom schema.
      void assertCustomSchemaCanBeUsedWitDefault()
      Verify that the server can be started with a default and custom schema.
      void assertDNHasAttributeShouldFail()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.assertDNHasAttribute(String, String) method throws an exception if the LDAP directory entry does not have the named attribute.
      void assertDNHasAttributeShouldSucceed()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.assertDNHasAttribute(String, String) method succeeds if the LDAP directory entry has the named attribute.
      void assertDNHasAttributeValueShouldFail()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.assertDNHasAttributeValue(String, String, String...) method throws an exception if the LDAP directory entry does not have the matching name/value pair.
      void assertDNHasAttributeValueShouldSucceed()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.assertDNHasAttributeValue(String, String, String...) method succeeds if the LDAP directory entry has a matching name/value pair.
      void assertDNIsAShouldFail()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.assertDNIsA(String, String) method throws an exception if the LDAP directory entry is not a member of the object class.
      void assertDNIsAShouldSucceed()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.assertDNIsA(String, String) method succeeds if the LDAP directory entry is a member of the object class.
      void checkAssertDNExistsFails()
      Verify that the assertion fails if the DN does not exist.
      void checkAssertDNExistsSucceeds()
      Verify that the assertion succeeds when the DN does exist.
      void checkServerIsRunning()
      Verify that the DirectoryServerRule launched an embedded directory server.
      void checkVerifyDNExists()
      Verify should return true if the DN exists and false if it does not.
      void checkVerifyDNHasAttribute()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.verifyDNHasAttribute(String, String) behaves correctly.
      void checkVerifyDNHasAttributeValue()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.verifyDNHasAttributeValue(String, String, String...) behaves correctly.
      void checkVerifyDNIsA()
      Verify that the DirectoryTester.verifyDNIsA(String, String) behaves correctly.
      void throwsExceptionIfInvalidDN()
      An exception is thrown when we try to verify an invalid DN.
